title: 109_hr3749
content: Gulf State Community Renewal Commission Act - Establishes the Gulf State Community Renewal Commission to: (1) examine, evaluate, and report on the rebuilding of both urban and rural communities in areas that were affected by Hurricane Katrina, (2) identify actions necessary for rebuilding such communities and neighborhoods. And (3) create rebuilding models and plans. Requires the models and plans to address: (1) transportation needs, (2) economic development and job creation, (3) the tourism industry, (4) housing needs, (5) agriculture development, (6) environmental concerns, and (7) natural disaster mitigation.
